Title: Requires state contracts with construction firms reserve five percent of such contract to discretionary spending towards small businesses
Summary: Requires state contracts with construction firms reserve five percent of such contract to discretionary spending towards small businesses located near the construction site; defines what qualifies as discretionary spending.
LawCode: Add ยง136-e, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to requiring construction contracts entered into by the state include a provision on the spending of discretionary funding
